name: Fire Or Die
description:
FIRE OR DIE: Play as the legendary professor Do Young as he battles his way to multiple enemies in order to avoid perishing. 

This platformer 2D game is inspired by doom, Metroid and Contra. There is no retries, there is no pause, you must beat this game in one play through 

Good Luck! 

GAMM Co. is a gaming company established in 2022. 

GAMM Co. Developers are Mohammed Uwais, Alexander Zimmerman, Gustavo France, and Mariu Cipriano 

Fire or Die is the first game GAMM Co. has produced.
